prop.name: printColumn
prop.desc: The number of the column in which the NewsArticle appears in the print edition.

prop.name: printEdition
prop.desc: The edition of the print product in which the NewsArticle appears.

prop.name: printSection
prop.desc: If this NewsArticle appears in print, this field indicates the print section in which the article appeared.

prop.name: printPage
prop.desc: If this NewsArticle appears in print, this field indicates the name of the page on which the article is found. Please note that this field is intended for the exact page name (e.g. A5, B18).

prop.name: dateline
prop.desc: A dateline is a brief piece of text included in news articles that describes where and when the story was written or filed though the date is often omitted. Sometimes only a placename is provided.

Article.name: pagination
Article.desc: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd; for example, "1-6, 9, 55" or "10-12, 46-49".

Article.name: pageEnd
Article.desc: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".

Article.name: articleSection
Article.desc: Articles may belong to one or more 'sections' in a magazine or newspaper, such as Sports, Lifestyle, etc.

Article.name: wordCount
Article.desc: The number of words in the text of the Article.

Article.name: articleBody
Article.desc: The actual body of the article.

Article.name: pageStart
Article.desc: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".
